attributes.action: force the USA to pay compensation to the families of all British troops killed through friendly fire by American troops
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: more and more British troops are being killed by Americans in what they call 'friendly fire'. i believe that America should now begin to pay the families of these troops to compensate for their loss, and also apologise in person.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
